name: Woods Of Disturbance
description:
You woke up in the middle of the forest, next to you is a freshly dug grave, your hands are tied and you don't remember how you ended up here. You must survive and get out of this forest at any cost.

---------------------------------------------

Controls in 2D section: 

  • Arrows - move
  • X - interact 
  • Escape - Pause menu.

Controls in 3D section: 

  • W, A, S, D - move
  • Shift - Run 
  • F - Flashlight
  • Left Control - crouch
  •  Space - jump
  •  E - Pick Up
  •  R - Reload
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  •  Right Mouse button - aim
  • Escape - Pause menu

P.S. Please leave your feedback :)
